channel.title: ci-cd choco travis on Zverev IV
channel.description: Recent content in ci-cd choco travis on Zverev IV

item.title: How to build and push chocolatey package with Travis CI
item.description: You can use this code for your .travis.yml: os:windowslanguage:shellbranches:only:- masterscript:- choco pack path_to\\package.nuspecafter_script:- choco apikey --key $CHOCOAPIKEY --source https://push.chocolatey.org/- choco pushHide your private api key in CHOCOAPIKEY secret variable. Enjoy!
